settings.content:
"Whether you choose one of our models
or one of our competitors', we will continue to champion the use of e-bikes.
Because we realise - and we hope you do too - that riding an e-bike is not only
good for the environment and your wallet, but it also puts a smile on your face
and the faces of future generations.

 

--Jason and William (founders of Heybike)

Years ago, our founder Jason had a life-changing realisation in his office: the traffic to and from work every day was unbearable. Plagued by traffic jams and delays, Jason decided to
revolutionise the commute for himself and for all those who are fed up with traffic jams.

William, an outdoor cycling expert, met Jason, a passionate cyclist, and their goal was to make commuting more comfortable. And so Heybike was born, the first Cityscape electric cruiser
bike. The bike makes travelling easier, but Cityscape means much more: a seamless integration of cycling into everyone's life. For the best riding experience, we've continually expanded our product range - from mountain bikes
to folding e-bikes - and now have more than 40 e-bike models.

Our mission

To provide widely available, affordable and
high-quality e-mobility for everyone.

 

Our Vision

To create a better, greener and more
comfortable life for as many people as possible.
